# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is valued at $8000 to us. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7500. Please let me know if this proposal suits your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
